title: Only In A Dream
lyrics:
Your eyes close tonight
And I'm not beside you
I'm gone, I'm gone
You're lost in your world
And I can't wake you
You're gone, you're gone



Just you and I

I know that you're dreaming

But I'm always awake when I'm with you

Just you and I

I know that you're dreaming

But I'm always awake when I'm with you



I'm always awake when I'm with you



I'm always awake when I'm with you



I know that you're dreaming

But I'm always awake when I'm with you



I'm always awake when I'm with you

But I'm always awake when I'm with you



Don't wake up tonight

Or you'll forget me

I'm lost, I'm lost

Your minds chasing memories

And I can't save them

You're lost, you're lost



Just you and I

I know that you're dreaming

But I'm always awake when I'm with you

Just you and I

I know that you're dreaming

But I'm always awake when I'm with you



I'm always awake when I'm with you



I'm always awake when I'm with you



I know that you're dreaming

But I'm always awake when I'm with you



I'm always awake when I'm with you

But I'm always awake when I'm with you
